name: BerlinRUG
tagline: Repository for the Berlin R Users Group (BerlinRUG)
body:
# Welcome to the Berlin R Users Group's Repository

Here you can find material being used at our group meetups, presentation slides, tutorial data etc.

Please feel free to [join the group](http://www.meetup.com/Berlin-R-Users-Group/) and come by one of our upcoming events.

## Meetups

### 2015-06-24: 1. Meetup

[Konstantin Greger: "Welcome and Group Introduction"](20150624/berlinrug-introduction/index.html) ([@kogreger](https://twitter.com/kogreger))

[Berry Boessenkool: "Why you need an umbrella on hot days"](http://kogreger.github.io/BerlinRUG/20150624/prectemp/Defense_PrecTemp.pdf) ([@berryboessenkoo](https://twitter.com/berryboessenkoo))

[Daniel Kirsch: "Analyzing Children's Relay Times for Fun and Gold Medals"](http://kogreger.github.io/BerlinRUG/20150624/relays/relays.pdf) ([@kirel](https://twitter.com/kirel))

### 2015-07-23: Best of useR! Conference 2015

[Konstantin Greger: "Welcome Slides"](20150723/berlinrug-2-welcome/index.html) ([@kogreger](https://twitter.com/kogreger))

[Konstantin Greger: "Spatial Analysis in R"](http://kogreger.github.io/BerlinRUG/20150723/spatial-analysis-in-r/Konstantin Greger - Spatial Analysis in R at useR Conference 2015.pdf) ([@kogreger](https://twitter.com/kogreger))
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
